objects.text:
X-TRANS CMOS SENSOR • ADVANCED AUTOFOCUS SYSTEM
CLASSIC RETRO DESIGN • BUILT-IN WI-FI • INTERCHANGEABLE LENSES
LIMITED TIME OFFER - SEIZE THE MOMENT

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens lineup
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative photography

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a high-impact, modern layout centered around a professional camera product. A bold, white title (`heading`) dominates the top, introducing the product name. Directly underneath is a sleek subheading (`subheading`) in bold orange, emphasizing accessibility and professionalism. The central focus is a product image (`product_image`), visually elevated against a dark radial tech-inspired background layered with concentric grids and directional arrows. Below the image lies a concise, all-caps features list (`description`) in white and a gray tagline (`tagline`) that invites urgency. The bold price (`price`) in orange captures attention, anchored above a prominent CTA button (`cta_button`) labeled “BUY NOW” (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Black: #000000 (background)
- Dark Gray: #121212 & #1E1E1E (gradient backdrop)
- Orange: #FF4A1E (accents, subheading, price, CTA)
- White: #FFFFFF (main and feature text)
- Light Gray: #CCCCCC (tagline)
product_color: The product image displays a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek and professional aesthetic, primarily driven by a monochromatic black theme complemented by subtle metallic and glass reflections. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), giving the product a modern and professional look. Shades of gunmetal gray (#3D3D3D) and silver (#C0C0C0) highlight the dials and lens rings, while clean white (#FFFFFF) text offers contrast for easy readability. Accents of red (#E53935) and amber-orange (#FF8F00) are strategically used around the lens to draw attention. For an ad banner, a palette of black, gray, white, and vibrant accents ensures a bold and focused design.
